channel.title: swipe on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in swipe on Barefoot Rob

item.title: game knows names of swipes
item.description: 16:51 Tuesday 26 December 2017 -03 Yay my game in Godot knows the names of swipes that are swiped by the player. I need to expand the ShapeDatabase a bit more as I have forgotten some basic ones, but they are all defined in one spot so it’s easy. https://github.com/thunderrabbit/robdot_conswi/blob/master/helpers/ShapeDatabase.gd Thank you Godot for making game dev simple!
